analyzed: 在寂靜處誠心如法行是陀羅尼。
translated: In a quiet place, sincerely and in accordance with the Dharma, practice this dhāraṇī.
This person will not pass seven days.
They will attain the four dhyānas and destroy the bonds of the desire realm.
They will see the buddhas of the ten directions and the samādhi of the Dharma mind.
They will be able to transform sentient beings and eliminate all hindrances.

They will also be able to cause them to not regress from bodhi.
They will be close to omniscience.
They will not give rise to wisdom from other causes.

Confess all offenses in front of the Buddha.
Make Buddha images and write out the Sun Treasury.
